shopkeeper_ada_dustwater.title: General Store Proprietor
shopkeeper_ada_dustwater.description: Keeps a meticulous ledger and an even keener eye. Ada sells staples, gossip, and the occasional quiet warning.

schedule.unavailable_reason: The shop is shuttered—Ada keeps strict hours.

shopkeeper_len_redmesa.title: Mercantile Clerk
shopkeeper_len_redmesa.description: Speaks softly, counts twice, and never looks surprised. Len’s prices are fair—until you give them a reason otherwise.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Len has stepped out to ‘settle accounts’.

shopkeeper_mrs_miller_crossing.title: Supply House Owner
shopkeeper_mrs_miller_crossing.description: Runs the supply counter like a small kingdom. If you’re polite, she’s kindly. If you’re not, she’s quick.

schedule.unavailable_reason: The counter is closed while Mrs. Miller takes inventory.

shopkeeper_silas_silversprings.title: Dry Goods Merchant
shopkeeper_silas_silversprings.description: Clean cuffs, sharp smile. Silas sells necessities, and he sells them like they’re luxury.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Silas is away—‘private customers’.

quartermaster_hale_sentinel.title: Fort Quartermaster
quartermaster_hale_sentinel.description: Stamped crates, clipped words. Hale sells what the fort can spare—and buys only what the fort can justify.

schedule.unavailable_reason: The supply office is closed for inspection.

quartermaster_clerk_sentinel.title: Supply Clerk
quartermaster_clerk_sentinel.description: Young, exhausted, and dangerously competent with a pencil. Voss does not argue with orders—only with math.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Voss is filing requisitions under lock and key.

quartermaster_sergeant_redoubt.title: Supply Sergeant
quartermaster_sergeant_redoubt.description: A straight-backed sergeant with a slanted desk. Kincaid sells the basics and pretends nothing ever goes missing.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Kincaid is on rounds—no one touches the crates.

quartermaster_clerk_redoubt.title: Runner
quartermaster_clerk_redoubt.description: All elbows and urgency. Ellery can fetch anything—if you catch them standing still long enough to ask.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Ellery’s been sent to the storeroom again.

outfitter_crossroads_master.title: Outfitter
outfitter_crossroads_master.description: Sells packs, rope, and hard truths. Dawson knows every trail that doesn’t want you on it.

schedule.unavailable_reason: The outfitter’s stall is closed—Dawson is checking the inbound wagons.

outfitter_crossroads_runner.title: Stall Runner
outfitter_crossroads_runner.description: Fast fingers, faster grin. Nell can find what you want—sometimes before you admit you want it.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Nell’s off running a ‘short errand’.

tribal_trader_matriarch.title: Trade Steward
tribal_trader_matriarch.description: Quiet eyes, careful hands. Seya trades fairly—so long as you do.

schedule.unavailable_reason: The exchange is closed—today is for council.

mission_caretaker_abel.title: Mission Caretaker
mission_caretaker_abel.description: Speaks gently and listens like it’s work. Abel offers supplies as ‘alms’ and accepts donations with precise gratitude.

schedule.unavailable_reason: The mission doors are closed for prayer.

caravan_merchant_wayfarer.title: Wagon Merchant
caravan_merchant_wayfarer.description: A smile like a coin trick. The Wayfarer sells oddities, essentials, and stories that feel too specific to be random.

schedule.unavailable_reason: The wagon’s shutters are down—the merchant is ‘counting blessings’.

roadhouse_bartender_rook.title: Bartender
roadhouse_bartender_rook.description: Warm lamps, colder stares. Rook pours drinks, sells bandages, and trades in the kind of information that stains your hands.

schedule.unavailable_reason: The bar is closed—someone’s cleaning up a mess.

roadhouse_bouncer_mara.title: Bouncer
roadhouse_bouncer_mara.description: Doesn’t smile much, doesn’t need to. Mara remembers faces and debts with equal clarity.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Mara is making a point—somewhere else.

gunsmith_ironwood.title: Gunsmith
gunsmith_ironwood.description: A workshop that smells like oil, smoke, and stubborn pride. Gideon doesn’t sell bravado—just hardware that survives it.

schedule.unavailable_reason: The forge is shut—Gideon’s working on a private commission.

gunsmith_apprentice_ironwood.title: Apprentice
gunsmith_apprentice_ironwood.description: Smudged with soot and pride. Tamsin can strip and clean a revolver faster than most folks can blink—when they’re not daydreaming.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Tamsin is running parts across town.

fort_doctor_mercy.title: Field Surgeon
fort_doctor_mercy.description: A medic who has stopped flinching. Mercy sells supplies, patches wounds, and speaks with the blunt kindness of necessity.

schedule.unavailable_reason: The dispensary is closed—an emergency call took the doctor out.

fence_backroom_broker.title: Backroom Broker
fence_backroom_broker.description: You don’t see a sign because there isn’t one. Grey buys the kind of objects that make other people nervous.

schedule.unavailable_reason: The curtain stays closed unless Grey expects you.

occult_whisper_contact.title: Unmarked Trade
occult_whisper_contact.description: A niche in the rock with offerings arranged like a careful argument. Sometimes you hear coins clink when no one is there.

schedule.unavailable_reason: The hollow is empty—only echoes answer.
